name: Legiones Astartes (X)
description: A Detachment selected from this Army List is considered to be of a specific Legion. Note that all units selected as part of a given Detachment must have the Legiones Astartes (X) special rule, or no variant of that special rule.

name: Legiones Astartes (Iron Warrior)
description: A Detachment selected from this Army List is considered to be of the Legiones Astartes (Iron Warrior). Note that all units selected as part of a given Detachment must have the Legiones Astartes (Iron Warrior) special rule, or no variant of that special rule.

name: Master of the Legion
description: May select a rite of war. May select one Apex Detachment.
